name: LitMan Level One Fifty Six
description:
[quote]Latest Update. Dev Kit Version 300976.29848.[/quote]

[b]Up to Level 156.[/b]

Original Stats:
60 Levels
7 619 025 XP
402 Attribute Points
497 Feats

Modded Stats:
156 Levels
331 173 189 XP
2512 Attribute Points
3036 Feats

Does not work with "LitMan Level Seventy Eight".

It is safe to replace "LitMan Level Seventy Eight" with this Mod. 

[quote]IMPORTANT: This Mod increases Level needed to open Legendary Chests to 156. If you want to be able open Legendary Chests from Level 1 you could use [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1367028501]LitMan Loot Legendary Chests[/url].[/quote]

Support Channel on Discord: https://discord.gg/TK8zPtH

I released all my Source files on Gitlab https://gitlab.com/kasperaitis/conan-exiles-mods if anyone wants to keep updated those Mods or release own ones.

If you need a previous version it also could be found on Gitlab https://gitlab.com/kasperaitis/conan-exiles-mods/tree/master/Compiled
